message.raw:
Made communication with the subprocess asynchronous. Now the parent process is listening for output and piping it to the output box all the time, not just when compilation is running.
This way the user can see when ModuleWatcher notices that modules need reloading, which otherwise would not have appeared until the next compilation. This is so far the only output that the subprocess should produce when not compiling.

message:
